title: Compare secondary sources on WWI's role

content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, and C. Explain ONE major difference between Keegan’s and Strachan’s interpretations of the role of the First World War in European history. Provide ONE piece of evidence from the period between the First and the Second World Wars that supports Keegan’s interpretation (Source 1) and explain HOW it supports the interpretation. Provide ONE piece of evidence from the period between the First and the Second World Wars that supports Strachan’s interpretation (Source 2) and explain HOW it supports the interpretation.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, and C. Explain ONE major difference between Keegan’s and Strachan’s interpretations of the role of the First World War in European history. Provide ONE piece of evidence from the period between the First and the Second World Wars that supports Keegan’s interpretation (Source 1) and explain HOW it supports the interpretation. Provide ONE piece of evidence from the period between the First and the Second World Wars that supports Strachan’s interpretation (Source 2) and explain HOW it supports the interpretation.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
